sentences:
Sentence 0:
This improved labeling scheme increases the sensitivity of the relaxation experiments by approximately fivefold when compared to randomly fractionally 13C-labeled protein, allowing high-quality measurements on relatively dilute (< 1 mM) protein samples at a relatively low cost.
sentence_raw: This improved labeling scheme increases the sensitivity of the relaxation experiments by approximately fivefold when compared to randomly fractionally 13C-labeled protein, allowing high-quality measurements on relatively dilute (< 1 mM) protein samples at a relatively low cost.
